Description: Sidder wood mummy-label of Ptollas, son of Thotorches.
Curator's comments: Published in S. P. Vleeming, Demotic and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels and Other Short texts gathered from Many Publications (Studia Demotica 9; Leuven: Peeters), no. 830.
Bibliographic references: Arlt 2011 / Deine Seele möge leben für immer und ewig: Die demotischen Mumienschilder im British Museum (no.31)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
